remarks: A condition for a filter to be finer than another involving their filter bases.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 3-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 2-Aug-2015.)
statement:
fgss2 $p |- ( ( F e. ( fBas ` X ) /\ G e. ( fBas ` X ) ) -> ( ( X filGen F ) C_ ( X filGen G ) <-> A. x e. F E. y e. G y C_ x ) ) $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d X x y $.
